name: By The Moon
description:
In this stealth game, you are a werewolf, and the town has arrested your pack, and you have to save them.  When the moon is behind the clouds, you can pass as human and the guards will mostly ignore you.  But when the moon is out, you transform into a wolfman and the guards will chase and try to kill you.  Stick to the shadows and sneak around, attack them before they attack you, fight back if they attack, or run away.  The choice is up to you.  Right click to move.  Left click to attack.  Hold Shift to run.  Q to quit.  

**This game was created for the ue4 Spring Jam, and is unfinished.  Plays fine, but short and is lacking the content and level design that I would've liked to include.
